DOC.brief_summary: This study estimate radiochemical radiation safety ass efficacy [ 18F ] MK-3328 , novel positron emission tomography ( PET ) tracer . The study safety hypotheses test whether [ 18F ] MK-3328 sufficiently safe well-tolerated , base assessment clinical laboratory evaluation adverse experience healthy participant , include healthy elderly ( HE ) participant , Alzheimer 's disease ( AD ) participant , permit continued investigation . The study efficacy hypothesis test whether [ 18F ] MK-3328 discriminate AD participant cognitively normal elderly control participant base tracer volume distribution , one surrogate , brain posterior cingulate gyrus .
